title: FS: HOFers, Elite 11, Ghost, Southern Leaguers

posts.post_title: FS: HOFers, Elite 11, Ghost, Southern Leaguers
posts.post_content:
Hello,

The following cards are for sale, listed prices include shipping costs and are net via Paypal f/f. Thanks!

-Anderson - SGC 1 - P350 - Ghost Reverse (Can send better image than this scan if interested, the full name and team name appear backwards on the reverse as well) - SOLD

One more bump on the Tinker and Collins...
